name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **Microservices**, and **RabbitMQ**. Proven track record in building and managing robust backend systems that leverage **distributed systems** and **message brokers** for enhanced performance. Adept at infrastructure management with a solid understanding of observability and monitoring to ensure system reliability and efficiency.
Strong problem-solving abilities paired with a collaborative team-oriented approach, enhancing cross-functional synergy and innovation. Additionally, experienced in high-performance application delivery within the healthcare and financial domains, utilizing frameworks and technologies such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **CI/CD** practices.

Leveraged CI/CD practices to deploy applications and maintain consistency between development and production environments using tools such as GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps.
Incorporated security best practices within microservices to protect sensitive health and financial data, enhancing compliance and risk mitigation strategies.
